In October, Sergio Marchionne ignited controversy when he said that Fiat would be better off if it eliminated Italy . Trade unions and politicians accused him of "blackmail" in pushing through a tough deal on working conditions at Fiat's flagship Mirafiori plant in Turin to save the factory from closure. statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Bob Muglia was no longer fit for the job. This is simply a recognition that all businesses go through cycles and need new and different talent to manage through those cycles, Steve Ballmer wrote at the time. While Steve Ballmer was vague about the reasons, analysts believed that the CEO had lost faith in Bob Muglia 's ability to lead the company into the next generation of enterprise computing.
